meanings.definition: A short introductory statement in a published work, typically written by the author.
meanings.sent1: The forewords in the book explained the author's inspiration for writing.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading the forewords of novels to learn more about the writer.
meanings.sent3: The forewords in the cookbook were so funny, they made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her forewords were like a warm hug, welcoming readers into her world.
meanings.sent5: The forewords painted a vivid picture of the author's creative process.

meanings.definition: The opening section of a book or other written work.
meanings.sent1: Before diving into the story, I like to read the forewords to set the tone.
meanings.sent2: The forewords of the manual provided a helpful overview of the content.
meanings.sent3: The forewords of the mystery novel were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: As I turned the pages, the forewords seemed to whisper secrets of the plot.
meanings.sent5: The forewords acted as a gateway to the adventure that awaited within the pages.
